description: A 'cheat code' method for developers to set or update an account in Surfpool. This method allows developers to set or update the lamports, data, owner, executable status, and rent epoch of a given account.

params.name: pubkey
params.description: The public key of the account to be updated, as a base-58 encoded string.

params.name: update
params.description: The `AccountUpdate` struct containing the fields to update the account.

description: A 'cheat code' method for developers to set or update a token account in Surfpool. This method allows developers to set or update various properties of a token account, including the token amount, delegate, state, delegated amount, and close authority.

params.name: owner
params.description: The base-58 encoded public key of the token account's owner.

params.name: mint
params.description: The base-58 encoded public key of the token mint (e.g., the token type).

params.name: update
params.description: The `TokenAccountUpdate` struct containing the fields to update the token account.

params.name: token_program
params.description: The optional base-58 encoded address of the token program (defaults to the system token program).
